EmailTemplate.Body:
Dear NAME LASTNAME,

attached to this mail you will find your Onboarding Guide. It contains all the necessary information you will need for your work at MHP.

Please take your time and read all documents carefully.

At the end of the OnBoarding Guide, you will find some "good to know" points that can help you with any challenges that may arise.

Your Username is: NAME.LASTNAME@mhp.com

Your password will be send to you in an additional e-mail.

Please change your password after your first login according to our security guidelines:

  • Password length at least 12 characters
  • Upper and lower case letters
  • Numbers and special characters

Please do not use vowel mutation (ä, ü, ö, ß) in your password, as they may cause problems when using some infrastructure services like VPN.

Take enough time to choose your new password. Your password should be easy to remember without having to write it down. You can also set up KeePass 2 to manage your passwords.

We wish you a good start at MHP and look forward to working with you.

Best regards

Your MHP IT
